response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to many users. Considering its value and your potential benefit, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price reflects the cost savings for you compared to the market value while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this offer presents a great opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
